pr_title: [BEAM-10303] Refactor split logic to reuse common logic.

timeline.message: Refactor split logic to reuse common logic.
Refactor split logic to reuse common logic.

timeline.bodyText:
it seems that the whole if-else branch could be simplified to just
windowedSplitResult =
              computeWindowSplitResult(
                  currentElement,
                  currentRestriction,
                  currentWindow,
                  windows,
                  currentWatermarkEstimatorState,
                  (elementSplit == null && downstreamSplitResult == null) ? currentWindowIndex : newWindowStopIndex,
                  newWindowStopIndex,
                  stopWindowIndex,
                  elementSplit,
                  watermarkAndState);

or maybe I missed something.
timeline.author: y1chi

timeline.bodyText: can both windowedSplitResult and downstreamElementSplit be null? if not should the check expressed with xor ^
timeline.author: y1chi

replies.bodyText: Yeah both windowedSplitResult.getResidualSplitRoot and downstreamElementSplit can be null. The only illegal state here is both of them are not null.
replies.author: boyuanzz
